newsitem.title: USA: Genentech stake held by FMR group.
newsitem.headline: Genentech stake held by FMR group.

text.p: A group led by FMR Corp said in a Securities and Exchange Commission filing Thursday that it holds a 21.38 percent stake in Genentech Inc, or 9,523,200 common shares.

The group disclosed its latest position on Genentech in a 13G filing. Such filings are usually made by institutions and large investors with "passive" investment objectives in a company. Unlike 13D filings, they do not list the latest transactions.
FMR Corp is the parent of the investment adviser to Fidelity Funds.
Genentech of South San Francisco, Calif., is an international biotechnology company.
